As hedge funds buy up papers, we are losing the sense of social responsibility once shown by local paper owners. In this new world, it’s profits over quality. I'm working in Congress to turn the tide and #SaveLocalNews.

#EqualPay is not just a women’s issue. The gender pay gap hurts families, businesses & our economy. Annually, women lose $900B due to paycheck discrimination. Imagine how different our economy would look if everyone earned a fair wage. #EqualPayDay pic.twitter.com/gmB5VjOjGW
Women shouldn’t have to work more than 15 months to earn what a man earns in 12. It’s time for the #PaycheckFairnessAct to become the law of the land. pic.twitter.com/RZrqDq4Q4t

Local news coverage helps shed light on the talent in our community, including these impressive young artists in @WCCUSD. #ReadLocal #SaveLocalNews  https://richmondstandard.com/lifestyle/entertainment-and-food/2019/03/31/wccusd-student-art-show-wows-at-richmond-art-center/ …

Last week I cast my vote in favor of the #PaycheckFairnessAct. Pay equity is critical to boosting women’s financial security. Based on today’s wage gap, a woman who worked full-time, year-round would lose $406,760 over a 40-year career. This is unacceptable. #EqualPayDay

This story by @jprieve with the @EastBayTimes reflects the benefits of local news. Her story highlights the life & legacy of S. Anthony Donato who worked tirelessly to transform downtown Pittsburg. #SaveLocalNews #ReadLocal https://www.eastbaytimes.com/2019/04/01/friends-remember-city-manager-who-changed-face-of-pittsburg/ …

For decades local journalism has informed our communities, but hedge funds are now favoring profits over quality news. Today, we will be sharing #localnews stories and will go to the floor tonight to talk about how to #SaveLocalNews. #ReadLocal pic.twitter.com/fERy3b6Twl
